Text: K-Katagiri-san...
Oh, sorry. Did you wait long? Sorry for calling you here...
It's fine. What's up?
Um...
I wanted to ask you something...
Do you dislike girls who are rough around the edges?
No, I like them... Why?
Ｏｈ ｗａｉｔ, just a moment...
That's not the real reason I called you.
There's something I really want to tell you...
Ah...
I know I may not have seemed that way, since I talk to everyone easily...
...but when I talk with you, I feel the most relaxed.
I only realized this recently.
The thought of graduating and not being able to see you anymore...
It made me really sad, and I didn't know what to do.
I'm a pretty easy-going person, but I've thought seriously about this, and I've made up my mind.
It's really embarrassing for a girl to say this, but I want you to hear my true feelings...
Just listen to them, that is enough.
I'll miss you.
I feel lonely without you... So... So, please...
Didn't I say earlier that I like girls that are rough around the edges?
Actually, I meant I like you, Katagiri-san.
Oh my goodness, I can't believe it! Really?
I wouldn't joke at a time like this.
Ah, ah... Unbelievable!! I can't believe it...
This is the happiest day of my life. I'll never forget it.
I'll never forget it as long as I live...!
